subject: Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback
description_text:
Hey,  

I was wondering if the haptic feedback is compatable with moza crp paddles with the mounts? 

Greetings 
Maikel Penninx
Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Maikel Penninx,  We have not designed a dedicated bracket for Moza, but there are 3D-printed mounting brackets available online that you can use.Â

Hey, 

To bad there isnt a original one ill have a look online for a mounting bracket thanks for the info

Greetings Maikel Penninx
Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone

> Op 7 jan 2026 om 13:34 heeft support@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:
> 
> ï»¿
> Hi Maikel Penninx,
> 
> We have not designed a dedicated bracket for Moza, but there are 3D-printed mounting brackets available online that you can use.
